remarks: Restricted specialization, generalized.  Weakens a hypothesis of ~ rspccv and seems to have a shorter proof.  (Contributed by BJ, 21-Nov-2019.)
statement:
bj-rspg.nfa $e |- F/_ x A $.
bj-rspg.nfb $e |- F/_ x B $.
bj-rspg.nf2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-rspg.is $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-rspg $p |- ( A. x e. B ph -> ( A e. B -> ps ) ) $.
